> ⚠️ **Unstable**: This @std package is experimental and its API may change without a major version bump.

## Overview

<p>Streaming utilities for working with tar archives.</p>
<p>Files are not compressed, only collected into the archive.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { <span class="pl-smi">UntarStream</span> } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/tar/untar-stream"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { dirname, normalize } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/path"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">for</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> (
  <span class="pl-k">const</span> entry <span class="pl-k">of</span> (<span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-smi">Deno</span>.<span class="pl-en">open</span>(<span class="pl-s">"./out.tar.gz"</span>))
    .<span class="pl-c1">readable</span>
    .<span class="pl-en">pipeThrough</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">DecompressionStream</span>(<span class="pl-s">"gzip"</span>))
    .<span class="pl-en">pipeThrough</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">UntarStream</span>())
) {
  <span class="pl-k">const</span> path <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-en">normalize</span>(entry.<span class="pl-c1">path</span>);
  <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-smi">Deno</span>.<span class="pl-en">mkdir</span>(<span class="pl-en">dirname</span>(path), { <span class="pl-c1">recursive</span>: <span class="pl-c1">true</span> });
  <span class="pl-k">await</span> entry.<span class="pl-c1">readable</span>?.<span class="pl-en">pipeTo</span>((<span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-smi">Deno</span>.<span class="pl-en">create</span>(path)).<span class="pl-c1">writable</span>);
}
</code></pre>
